search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for RepairShopr (repairshopr.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for RepairShopr can be found at: [https://www.repairshopr.com/pricing](https://www.repairshopr.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: RepairShopr Pricing - Computer Repair Shop Software

extracted_content.content:
RepairShopr Pricing - Simple pricing for online invoicing - Computer Repair Shop Software – CRM & Invoice System
===============

[![Image 1: Computer Repair Shop Software – CRM & Invoice System](https://www.repairshopr.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/logo.png)](https://www.repairshopr.com/)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes both monthly and annual options with a discount for annual payments.

additional_fees.fee_description: Different plans come with different amounts, additional SMS usage is charged separately.
Available only in the U.S., requires purchase of stamp credits.
